# AUParameterEventType.parameterEvent_Immediate

**Case**

An immediate change from the parameter’s previous value to a new value.

## Declaration

```swift
case parameterEvent_Immediate
```

## Constants

- **AUParameterEventType.parameterEvent_Ramped**: A gradual change from the parameter’s previous value to a new value, applied linearly over a specified period of time

items.description: A gradual change from the parameter’s previous value to a new value, applied linearly over a specified period of time
items.name: AUParameterEventType.parameterEvent_Ramped
